name: ballPin
description:
The game ballPin is based on a few different ideas from games most of us have played as children.

  • Like the game Planko, all you can do is determine where you drop the ball.
  • Similar to the game connect-four, you have to hit four red pins, but you have to do it in one drop!
  • The third idea is from the hot/cold game that everyone has played at least once! Refer to the colors of the pins to navigate to the winning pins. Blue=cold(far away), green=cool(closer), yellow=warm(close), and red=hot(win)
  • You start the game with 10 lives. Every time you drop the ball you lose a life, but if you pass a level, then you gain a life!
